bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I love to buzz around flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🐝 I make something sweet and golden.
🌼 I help flowers make seeds.
💛 I have black and yellow stripes.

bug.question: I am red with black spots, and people say I bring good luck. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I am a type of beetle.
🪴 Gardeners love me because I eat aphids.
⚫ I have polka dots.

bug.question: I build my home underground with lots of my friends. We all work together! What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very small but very strong.
🧺 I carry things that are bigger than me.
👑 We follow a queen.

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar, then go into a chrysalis, and come out with beautiful wings. What am I?

hints.text: 🦋 I am a symbol of transformation.
🌈 I come in many different colors.
🌸 I drink nectar from flowers.

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my dinner. I have eight legs, not six. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ My home is very strong and sticky.
🕷️ I'm not technically an insect.
🍽️ Flies are my favorite food.

bug.question: I jump really high and make a chirping sound. I love to eat plants. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I am usually green.
🎶 I rub my legs together to make music.
🦗 Some people consider me a pest.

bug.question: I glow in the dark to attract a mate, I have a light inside me. What am I?

hints.text: 💡 I shine at night.
✨ My light is called bioluminescence.
🔥 I'm also called a lightning bug.

bug.question: I am a master of disguise, looking just like a twig on a tree. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I can be hard to spot.
🍃 I eat leaves.
🌿 I'm very long and skinny.

bug.question: I mimic the look and sound of a bee, but I don't sting. What am I?

hints.text: 🪰 I am actually a fly!
🐝 I want other animals to think I can sting, but I can't.
🎭 I am good at pretending.

bug.question: I am a social insect that builds large nests of paper-like material. I can sting if I feel threatened. What am I?

hints.text: ⚠️ My sting can be painful!
🏠 I build my nest out of chewed wood pulp and saliva.
🐝 I am often confused with bees.

cosmos.question: I shine bright in the night sky, and the moon goes around me. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I give off light and heat.
🌎 Earth orbits around me.
🌞 I am a very common star.

cosmos.question: I am Earth's natural satellite, reflecting sunlight back to Earth. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 I have phases, from full to new.
🐇 Some people think there is a rabbit on my surface.
🚀 Astronauts have walked on me.

cosmos.question: I am a big ball of gas that makes light and heat, and I'm very, very far away. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I twinkle in the night sky.
🔭 Some are red, some are blue.
🌟 Our sun is one of me.

cosmos.question: I am a rocky body orbiting the Sun, but I'm too small to be called a planet. What am I?

hints.text: 💥 Sometimes I hit Earth.
☄️ Some people call me a space rock.
🌌 I am much smaller than a planet.

cosmos.question: I am a collection of stars, gas, and dust held together by gravity. What am I?

hints.text: 💫 I can be spiral, elliptical, or irregular.
🥛 The Milky Way is one of me.
✨ I am huge, containing billions of stars.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a pattern in the night sky. What am I?

hints.text: ursa Major (The Big Dipper) is an example
📜 Ancient people used me to tell stories.
🌠 I am made up of many stars.

cosmos.question: I am a hot, glowing ball of gas that is usually born from a nebula. When I die, I can turn into a black hole or a white dwarf. What am I?

hints.text: 💥 I create light and energy through nuclear fusion.
🪐 I am classified by my color, size, and brightness.
🌟 Our Sun is a relatively small one of me.

cosmos.question: I am a giant cloud of gas and dust in space, often where stars are born. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I can be very colorful.
✨ Stars come to life in me.
💨 I am made of hydrogen, helium and other elements.

cosmos.question: I am a place in space where gravity is so strong that even light cannot escape. What am I?

hints.text: 🕳️ I am often formed by the collapse of a massive star.
🌀 I warp space and time around me.
🌌 You can't see me directly, but my effects are visible.

cosmos.question: I am the explosion of a star, the largest explosion that takes place in space. What am I?

hints.text: 💥 I can briefly outshine an entire galaxy.
🔥 I can leave behind a neutron star or a black hole.
🌟 I distribute heavy elements into space.
